alert.note: Alert for Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 17 at 8:14PM CDT until August 18 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Lake County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar estimated between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Isolated thunderstorms are possible through the night. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Campers should be prepared for rising waters tonight, including the Little Isabella River and portage number 75, the Snake River, Stony River and Bog Lake. Forest roads may also be flooded. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Isabella, southern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness and Murphy City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
